description: This file defines the 'Note' entity class used for representing note records in a database within a backend system. It includes properties such as id, title, content, tags, creation and update timestamps, along with lifecycle callback methods for persistence events.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class representing a note with properties like title, content, tags, and timestamps, mapped to database table 'notes'. It includes lifecycle callbacks to update timestamps.

methods.name: prePersist
methods.description: Method annotated with @PrePersist to initialize createdAt and updatedAt timestamps before inserting a new record.

methods.name: preUpdate
methods.description: Method annotated with @PreUpdate to update the updatedAt timestamp before updating an existing record.

methods.name: Note (constructor)
methods.description: Constructor to create a new Note object with specified title, content, and tags.
